name: Grapito
description:
A 2D party-game based on physics and grapples. Optimized for instant fun and back-to-back short games. Race against your friends in this retro ascension where skills are built over broken friendships.

The first game by Shred Eagle is a love letter to arcade couch-gaming, handwritten from scratch. Requires Xbox controller(s)

Or compatible, it cannot be played with mouse and keyboard.

Race to the top
  1. Skilled grapple throws 
  2. Graceful airtime
  3. Lost friendships
Game Modes
  • Multiplayer: Local-multiplayer, 2-4 players climbing against each other.
  • Free Solo: 1 player, allowed to move freely and without pressure, to train or relax.
  • Floor is Lava: 1 player, climb as high as you can, without ever landing on your feet! 
Requirements
  • Windows machine
  • OpenGL 4.2
  • Xbox controllers
